import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import PageTitle from "../common/PageTitle"; import { Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, Container, Row, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button, } from "shards-react"; class Login extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { id: null, anggota_keluarga: null, } } componentDidMount() { console.log(this.props); this.setState({ id:this.props.id }) this.getAnggotaKeluarga(this.props.id); } getAnggotaKeluarga(id){ const config = { headers:{ Authorization: 'Bearer '+localStorage.getItem('jwt') } }; axios.get('family-members?family.id='+id, config) .then(res => { this.setState({ anggota_keluarga: res.data }); }) .catch(err => { console.error('There was an error!', err); }); } render() { let anggota_keluarga = this.state.anggota_keluarga; console.log("Data Anggota Render"); console.log(anggota_keluarga); // anggota_keluarga.map(function(keluarga, i){ // console.log(keluarga); // }) return ( {/* Editor */}
